components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,FUEL SYSTEM, GASOLINE
summary: WHILE TRAVELING AT 30MPH, THE VEHICLE BACKFIRED.  THE CONSUMER PULLED VEHICLE OVER AND LOOKED UNDER THE HOOD AND NOTICED GAS SPRAYING OVER THE ENGINE, WHICH WAS COMING FROM THE GAS LINE.  THE GAS LINE HAD BLOWN.  IMMEDIATELY AFTER, THE VEHICLE DIED.  THE  DEALER WAS CONTACTED.  TS  SCC
